this game is amazing it is a game i played for a long time as a child and today it reminds me of good memories i have no objection to this game  the game has many missions both as mecs soldiers sea rippers sorceress and as kabuto giant blue monster each type of character contains its own story and very different missions  the game has a humorous and fun narrative and even with graphics from 20 years ago its story and gameplay can hold you for hours
ive played this game since i was 4 and its great to play it again this game is a classic and at 10 theres no reason not to try it
this game was fun 20 years ago its fun now 1v3v5 hilarious gameplay

cant recommend this enough  this game is fun
